name: 100% Arabica - Roasted Coffee Beans
description:
• Enjoy the ultimate farm-to-cup experience with the nuanced flavours of 100% Arabica coffee beans (Bulk-Grade) from our estate nestled in the verdant, misty hills of the Bababudangiri Range in Chikkamagaluru, Karnataka.

  •  Our estate's Arabica beans are of the highest quality, shade-grown amidst lush native jungle and fruit trees at high elevations of 4500 to 5000 feet. 

  • FLAVOUR NOTES: Long-lasting, pleasant taste with a delicate flavour, balanced aroma, and rich mouthfeel.

  • DRINKING PREFERENCES: Perfect for creating an Espresso, Ristretto, or Cortado, this coffee is best enjoyed black. 

  • Our 1 kg and 5 kg offerings are ideal for stocking up your office pantry or for coffee machines at any food retail outlet. 

  • SHELF LIFE: 12 months from the date of manufacture.
